# The gmp extension

Configure the `gmp` extension.

This extension provides GNU Multiple Precision Arithmetic support.

## EXT_GMP

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_GMP_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
